library.description:
Converse.js is an XMPP/Jabber chat client that runs in your web browser.

It can connect to any public XMPP server, or you can set up your own.

It can be used as an application with no modification required, or you can extended and customize it to your needs.

It's possible to enable single-session support, whereby users already authenticated in your website will also automatically be logged in on the chat server.
library.name: converse.js

library.description: jquery-comments is a jQuery plugin for implementing an out-of-the-box commenting solution to any web application with an existing backend. It provides all the UI functionalities and ties them to callbacks that let you easily define what you want to do with the data. The library is highly customizable and very easy to integrate thanks to a wide variety of settings.
library.name: jquery-comments
